product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Dining Table - X Large - Special Buy
long_description: Durable and easy to pack down for transport, the extra large ALPS Mountaineering Dining Table is a perfect match for outdoor dining with large groups, be it backyard, park, beach or campsite. Durable and smooth aluminum top unrolls into a spacious table that comfortably up to 6 people. Rugged aluminum X-frame has no interfering side supports so chairs can move up close. Tabletop and frame collapse quickly and slide easily into the included transport/storage bag. Aluminum construction cleans up easily and is great for family camping, tailgating or backyard barbecues. Special buy.
short_description: Durable and easy to pack down for transport, the extra large ALPS Mountaineering Dining Table is a perfect match for outdoor dining with large groups, be it backyard, park, beach or campsite.
